alert.note: Alert for Northern Clearwater Mountains; Southern Clearwater Mountains (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 20 at 8:01AM MST until January 21 at 1:00AM MST by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT PST TONIGHT... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches below 4000 feet in elevation and ice accumulations of a light glaze. Snow accumulations off up to 6" above 4000 feet. Snow bands this evening will bring moderate to heavy snow and very low visibility. * WHERE...Elk River, Highway 11 Pierce to Headquarters, Pierce, Dixie, Elk City, and Highway 12 Lowell to Lolo Pass. * WHEN...Until midnight PST tonight. * IMPACTS...Travel could be affected. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Northern Clearwater Mountains; Southern Clearwater Mountains
